channel.title: Project RS06 - A RuneScape 2006 replica now in open BETA
channel.description:
[center][img]http://projectrs06.com/images/reksio/logo.png[/img][/center]
[size=16pt]http://www.ProjectRS06.com[/size] You must register before playing!
Hi all, welcome to Project RS06! At Project RS06 we will strive to make your stay as enjoyable as possible, and try to foster a positive and supportive community.
If you need further help, please post it in the [url=http://projectrs06.com/Forum-Support]Support[/url] board. If you have feedback or suggestions, please post it in the [url=http://projectrs06.com/Forum-Suggestions-Feedback]proper board[/url] as well.
[u]The Team[/u] These people are members of the Project RS06 team. There are also a few lined up that will be revealed in due time. Expect it to grow once we are out of BETA! David - Lead Developer Pompano - Project Manager, SEO-Guru
[u]XP Rate[/u] Currently we are having a discussion about what the official XP rate should be. You can join in the discussion [url=http://projectrs06.com/Thread-Official-XP-Rate-Voting-Thread]here[/url]. We expect the rate to be somewhere around the 1.5x mark.
[u]Media[/u] (more coming soon) [img]http://i1282.photobucket.com/albums/a526/dylan1496/Untitled.png[/img] [img]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0fEf2x-wLUM/UMjeYwmUInI/AAAAAAAAADs/6pPkmM2OUls/s640/KBD.PNG[/img] [img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ETfXyPd7RcE/UMjed4q2NEI/AAAAAAAAAD0/g2HIm5T3Z00/s640/kbd2.PNG[/img] [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DCyDh0d6Duk/UMjeUvtUxDI/AAAAAAAAADk/-Vihzo8jDKw/s640/Invo.PNG[/img] [img]http://i1282.photobucket.com/albums/a526/dylan1496/Untitled2.png[/img] [img]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/scr061.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/1zvzm2x.png[/img]

item.title: Project RS06 - A RuneScape 2006 replica now in open BETA
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I am also locking this topic. David isn’t running the server so I don’t understand why he should have an advertisement for it - not to mention that this thread is going insane. If you have any problems pm Taharok or me.

Read full topic

item.title: Project RS06 - A RuneScape 2006 replica now in open BETA
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:447, topic:472776”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=590587.msg4198779#msg4198779 date=1357867552]

Vault if you didn’t let your sources escape from under your nose, you wouldn’t be questioning fake thieves. We can get this straight, this isn’t your source. From what I know, David programmed most of this by himself. If he ‘stole’ any of your content, then you can blame yourself for letting it get leaked.

David is nothing but a leecher that is using Vaults server to make money with.

Even if thats true, Vault is the biggest faggot alive
[/quote]

Wouldn’t even call it Vaults server.

I’d guess about 0.01% of the code is actually Vaults.[/quote]
Well, considering this
that makes him an even bigger faggot

Read full topic
item.source: Project RS06 - A RuneScape 2006 replica now in open BETA

item.title: Project RS06 - A RuneScape 2006 replica now in open BETA
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:451, topic:472776”][quote author=RSVault link=topic=590587.msg4198803#msg4198803 date=1357868394]

I never scammed anyone. I want to make it clear that was never my intention; my only goal with 2006Scape was to remake RuneScape.

Don’t believe me? You don’t have to. Believe Jagex. They posted the names of the developers of 2006Scape on the official RuneScape forums under a JMods name to prove that Jagex was in fact involved.
[/quote]I don’t believe you scammed. You just set people up for a major let down.
The true scammers are the people you paid to develop the server to be completely honest.

I definitely didn’t “set” people up, as I didn’t think it would happen.

I don’t see how the developers are scammers, they worked extremely hard and well-deserved the pay.

I mean, our developers aren’t being paid in any way, and we have more done, and we have the correct messages…

Your developers ripped you off, Lol. I feel sorry that you don’t see that. I honestly do.[/quote]

Some of them, yes. The team at the end? Definitely not. I know Blake especially worked very hard on the server and they deserve recognition for their efforts. You need to get knocked off your platform of: We were better in everyway.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Problem_Solver wrote:

Ollie why don’t you talk to ry6000 and work out a compromise? Use ry6000’s source on your server/website (since david bought a very expensive one hate to see it go to waste),ry6000 would be head in command and Ollie you would be second in command? I mean a great source+server+big player base isn’t that what everyone wants? If you don’t agree with this im sure you two can work out a different type of negotiation. Point is a split community isn’t good imagine what you guys could accomplish working together!

item.title: Project RS06 - A RuneScape 2006 replica now in open BETA
item.dc:creator: @cool4345 cool4345
item.description:
@cool4345 wrote:

Just thought i’d add this:

This is what happened.

Frell stood in the midddle of catherby earlier today, freely talking about how david “planned to give the server to rune rebels” and that “project06 is using the leaked RS2006 source”.

Shortly after a topic was made by mortimer, a spectator who was there, who posted screenshots from the conversation. Frell also apparently livestreamed himself saying some of that stuff or something along those lines, apparently.

Frell responded to this topic, saying that he wasn’t hacked, and attempted to hide the thread from KO9 by using his powers to change the topic title to something unrelated, and also begging the topic starter to change the name as well when he kept changing it back.

He then said that he’d lie and post a topic in the news forum saying that he was hacked- which he did. However on page 2 of this topic he said to ignore that lie and that he was never actually hacked. He deleted the original topic which wasn’t made by him as the topic starter kept changing the title of it.

He posted several times in both of those threads, every time he would have the link to his server in his post.

Meanwhile, unrelated to this (apparently) miss siliabsoft started a topic on the forum, freely giving away how “easily exploitable” the server is, and saying that people were duping phats in varrock. Don’t know if this is even true or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Project RS06 - A RuneScape 2006 replica now in open BETA

I’ve really lost my respect for Frell and silabsoft from this, it really shows how all big and might mods and ex mods REALLY act. What a joke
